casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Felix Ricardo SALDIERNA. No. 271P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 3, 2015. W. Rob Heroy, Charlotte, for Saldierna, Felix. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of August 2015 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of August 2015."
